actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.

official_title: A bill to amend the Elementary and Secondary Education Act of 1965 to provide that programs for migratory children shall include the children of migratory horse groomers.

summary.text: Revises the Elementary and Secondary Education Act of 1965 to provide that programs for migratory children shall include the children of migratory horse groomers.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Elementary and Secondary Education Act of 1965 to provide that programs for migratory children shall include the children of migratory horse groomers.
